title: Winning Time, MLB Signage, Boston on the Bus
itunes:title: Winning Time, MLB Signage, Boston on the Bus
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch discuss Jerry West's distaste with HBO's Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty, sign stealing in the MLB and how the Boston Red Sox plan to avoid Canadian Covid-19 protocols. All that and more on Business of Sports.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
